summary: Project to create an AI (details not yet specified).
architectural_notes: Visual direction change: user requests a more colorful UI theme across the app.

existing_features.title: Build an MVP “AI assistant” experience as a chat-style UI that answers users using a user-managed knowledge base (FAQ-style entries) and simple keyword matching (no external AI/LLM APIs).
Create a Knowledge Base management screen in the React frontend to add/edit/delete knowledge entries and view all existing entries.
Add an authenticated app shell with navigation between Chat and Knowledge Base, and ensure unauthenticated users are prompted to sign in with Internet Identity.

Apply a coherent visual theme across the app (color palette, typography, spacing, component styling) suitable for a productivity “assistant” tool; avoid default-looking styling and avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors.
Generate and include a simple app logo/mark as a static asset and display it in the app header/login view.

Rename the application to “UNKNOWN CRIC” across all user-facing UI text and page metadata, replacing existing “AI Assistant”/generic titles where they represent the product name (e.g., header brand title, unauthenticated landing welcome title, browser tab title).

Update the app’s visual theme to be more colorful while maintaining a coherent design system (light and dark modes), increasing the use of accent/secondary colors, contrast, and visual interest (e.g., gradients, tinted surfaces, and more distinct component states) without switching to blue/purple as the primary brand colors.

On the Chat page, when the chat history is empty (before the user starts chatting), display a set of selectable quick options/buttons labeled "Study", "Knowledge", "Research", and "Other" above the message input area (in the existing empty-state UI).

Make each pre-chat option actionable: clicking an option should prefill the chat Textarea with a short English prompt appropriate to the selected option (without sending automatically), and place focus in the Textarea so the user can edit and send.

Style the pre-chat options to match the existing app theme: use existing UI components (e.g., shadcn Button/Card) and ensure the options look good in both light and dark mode, preserving the current empty-state layout and spacing.

new_feature_requests.summary: Define requirements and scope for the AI to be created (purpose, platform, capabilities).
Implement backend persistence in Motoko for knowledge entries and chat history per authenticated user (Internet Identity), including CRUD operations for knowledge entries.
Update the app's visual theme to be more colorful (increase color usage/contrast across UI while maintaining coherence).
Add pre-chat selectable options/quick actions (e.g., Study, Knowledge, Research, etc.) shown before the user starts chatting to guide intent/mode.
